channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Debris from alleyway, 26th August
item.description:
The alleyway between no 40 and 42 constantly deposits gravel and other debris especially when there is rain. This is now covering the footpath and can be hazardous under foot. A simple drainage channel being added between the pavement and alleyway could massively prevent this from happening
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 42, Ridgeway West, Falconwood, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Over hanging shrubs / trees facing play area, 26th August
item.description:

item.title: Barclay House Elevator., 26th August
item.description:
I live on 4th floor with a 3 month old baby. The elevator is not working and it is A HUGE struggle to get up and down with a buggy , car seat and bags. NEEDS TO BE FIXED ASAP! i have health issues that i need to attend appointments and so does my baby!
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Well Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Why are the waste people clearing this?!, 26th August
item.description:
This has been pulling up for weeks now with tramps using it as a housing area - Hackney waste goes down this street everyday it needs to be cleared. The tramps collect their drinkable drugs from the chemist and chuck everything here.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Dericote Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
